name: Cooking pots
description: Oven & Stovetop Safe: Gotham Steel cookware is oven safe up to 500 degrees and compatible with all types of stovetops- Gas, electric, halogen & ceramic, besides induction  allowing you to cook virtually anywhere you'd like.

name: Cooking Pans
description: Goodful's All in One 11-inch deep dish nonstick pan can replace your bulky kitchen cookware sets. The multi-functional pan can be used as a frying pan, saute pan, sauce pan, stockpot, wok pan, skillet, and braiser. Includes lid and beechwood turner.

description: Premium Design: Effortlessly prepare a wide range of recipes and enjoy the benefits of easy cleaning, perfect preheating, deep vessel shapes, comfortable handling, and superior heat distribution in one exceptional cookware set.

description: Set includes: 8, 10 and 11,5 inch fry pan, 11.5 inch lid, 10.25 inch square griddle, 1 quart saucepan with lid, 2 and 3 quart saucepan with lids, 3.5 quart deep sauté pan with lid, 5 quart dutch oven with lid, 3 quart steamer insert, and a 1 egg fry pan.

name: Storage bags
description: Microwave Safe, Dishwasher Safe, Freezer Safe, Boil, Airtight, Leakproof, All Cookware, The best substitute for plastic, ziplock storage, sous vide & meal prep bags!, Thick silicone doesn’t break, soft & foldable, can be stored flat

name: Lunch Boxes
description: Sleek - Maelstrom Foodie Buds Are An Ultra-Light Lunch Bag Weighing Only 1.0Lb, That Takes Less Space While Still Providing Plenty Of Volume15L. The Specially Designed Skeleton Structure And The Four Sides Stitched Lining Keeps The Lunch Bag Standing Upright Even After Being Folded Flat For A Long-Time. It's A Perfect Lunch Bag For Work, Business Trips, and daily travel. Advanced Thermal Efficiency - Thoughtful Five Layer Insulation Design. Exterior Surfaces Are Made Of Rip-Stop Nylon Fabric Plus One Layer Of Waterproof Pvc. Interior Layers Are Thicker, Reinforced Food-Grade Peva Materials With Seamless Ultrasonic Welding For 100% Leak-Proof And Tear-Resistance. A Built-In 5Mm Epe Foam Middle Layer And 210D Liner Add Additional Insulation, Allowing The Maelstrom Foodie Buds To Keep Food Cold/Warm Until It's Time to dig in. Durability - Is An Outstanding Feature Of The Foodie Buds. The Reinforced Zipper With An Attractive Tail Rope Is Not Going To Get Stuck, And Is Easier To Open And Close. The Webbing And A Padded Handle Are Thoroughly Stitched Together, Which Is Tear-Proof And Comfortable To Carry Without Strangling Your Hand. The Lunch Bag Is Equipped With A Detachable And Adjustable Long Shoulder Strap, Giving You Two Options To Comfortably carry the bag. Unique Design - Maelstrom Designed An Insulated Front Pocket. The Inside Of The Front Pocket Is Made Of Food-Grade Thick Aluminum Foil, Sewn With One Elastic Band To Hold Cutlery, And Four Little Foil Pockets Are Sewn For Knives And Forks. It Is Specially Designed To Put Oily Tableware In To Clean Later. Very Useful And Cleanable. MULTI-POCKETS - Main compartment is used for lunch, bread, etc. The top layer is more suitable for storing fruits, cakes, salad, or drinks. The Maelstrom portable lunch bag is equipped with one front pocket for storing dirty tableware, and two mesh side pockets to stash extra snacks. One of them is specially zipped to hold small items. One mesh pocket on the cover of the bag can hold disposable tableware and towels, and finally one large pocket on the back to hold plates and napkins.

name: Vacuum bottles
description: STAYS HOT OR COLD: THERMOS vacuum insulation technology for maximum temperature retention of hot or cold meals. Keeps the weather out and the delicious in. Soups stay hot for up to 9 hours and cold foods stay cold up to 14 hours. EXTREMELY DURABLE: High quality 18/8 stainless steel construction is dependable any time of the year, from lunch on-the-go to camping in the wilderness. SWEAT-PROOF: Exterior stays cools to the touch with hot contents and sweat-proof with cold. THERMOS brand food jars are dishwasher safe, top rack recommended. SPOON INCLUDED: A full-sized spoon that folds for conveniently storing inside of lid. The insulated lid doubles as a built-in serving bowl. OTHER CAPACITIES: Love the food jar but looking for a different size? The STAINLESS KING food jar also comes in a 24 ounce and 47 ounce capacity. SINCE 1904: THERMOS brand products have been making everyday life better, every time. Hot stays hot. Cold stays cold. Food and drinks stay fresh. The little things go a long way, so do we
